description: Most people love waking up to the amazing aroma of freshly brewed&nbsp;coffee in the morning. In fact, many people require coffee in the morning to be able to function properly throughout the whole day.And because of this coffee obsession, many people are also looking for the best variation to their coffee that will give them more taste and value. If you are one of these people, you donâ€™t have to look further as our Caramel Irish Coffee recipe is the perfect one for you.
name: Caramel Irish Coffee

recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the ingredients and preheat your mug.
recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients and preheat your mug.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Irish cream liqueur, Irish whiskey, and butterscotch schnapps into the preheated mug.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Irish cream liqueur, Irish whiskey, and butterscotch schnapps into the preheated mug.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the remaining freshly brewed coffee and stir.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the remaining freshly brewed coffee and stir.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with your garnishes. The most commonly used garnishes for this recipe are whipped cream and caramel syrup.
